subtasks.name: Identify Story Theme
subtasks.description: Determine the central theme or concept for the story that will guide the narrative direction.
subtasks.expected_output: A clear and concise statement of the story theme that will serve as a foundation for developing the plot.

subtasks.name: Define Main Characters
subtasks.description: Outline the main characters involved in the story, including their motivations, backgrounds, and roles in the narrative.
subtasks.expected_output: Character profiles for each main character, detailing their attributes, motivations, and relationships.

subtasks.name: Outline the Plot Structure
subtasks.description: Create a basic outline of the plot, including the beginning, middle, and end, highlighting key events and conflict.
subtasks.expected_output: A structured outline that clearly defines the plot progression with major events listed.

subtasks.name: Develop Supporting Characters
subtasks.description: Identify and outline supporting characters who will enhance the main characters and contribute to the plot.
subtasks.expected_output: Profiles for supporting characters that detail their roles and significance to the story.

subtasks.name: Establish Setting
subtasks.description: Determine the time and place in which the story occurs, and identify any unique environmental factors that impact the narrative.
subtasks.expected_output: A detailed description of the setting, including location, time period, and any relevant cultural or atmospheric details.

subtasks.name: Create Character Arcs
subtasks.description: Map out the development of the main characters over the course of the story, focusing on their growth and changes.
subtasks.expected_output: Character arc diagrams that illustrate how each main character evolves from beginning to end.

subtasks.name: Draft the Story
subtasks.description: Write the first draft of the story, integrating all elements (theme, plot, characters, and setting) into a coherent narrative.
subtasks.expected_output: An initial draft of the story that includes all essential elements and flows logically from beginning to end.

subtasks.name: Edit and Revise
subtasks.description: Review the original draft for consistency, coherence, and clarity, making necessary revisions to enhance the narrative.
subtasks.expected_output: A polished version of the story that reflects necessary edits, improving overall quality and readability.

subtasks.name: Gather Feedback
subtasks.description: Share the revised story with peers or a focus group to obtain constructive feedback that can inform further revisions.
subtasks.expected_output: A compilation of feedback highlighting strengths, weaknesses, and suggestions for improvement.

subtasks.name: Final Revision
subtasks.description: Incorporate feedback into the last round of edits to finalize the story, ensuring it meets all outlined criteria.
subtasks.expected_output: A completed final version of the story, ready for presentation or publication.
